body:
What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. Use Wall of Reverence in game 2. 3. What is the expected output? What do you see instead? Card reads: At the end of your turn you may gain life equal to the power of target creature you control.
In playing, it only allows me to pick the Wall itself, but I had other creatures available. What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? 1.26
Windows 7 If you are reporting a game play bug, please attach your game.log file. If you are reporting a crash, please attach both crash.log and game.log files (both files are found in the main game folder). Please provide any additional information below.
author: [clayton....@ymail.com](https://code.google.com/u/115389003795609959110/)
title: Wall of Reverence - only allows targetting itself

comments.body: Update: Seems it may have been because I had creatures with Protection from White. Thus they saw the "target" and wouldn't allow selection. Not sure that's correct, but I believe that explains the behavior.
comments.author: [clayton....@ymail.com](https://code.google.com/u/115389003795609959110/)

comments.body:
Thanks for the update. Protection from white would indeed explain the situation. I'll close this issue. Do open a new issue if you notice anything strange with Wall of Reverence. Btw, 1.27 is out, you may want to update to the latest version.

**Status:** Fixed
